amendatorysection.para: A report shall be submitted to the Governor and the Legislature as to the efforts of the Nebraska Rural Health Advisory Commission, University of Nebraska Medical Center, and Creighton University Medical Center to increase the number of graduates entering primary care postgraduate residency training programs. The report shall include recommendations as to further steps that should be taken to increase the number of such graduates. The report shall be submitted to the Nebraska Rural Health Advisory Commission for comment by October 1 in 1994, 1995, and 1996. The report shall be submitted to the Governor and the Legislature by December 1 in 1994, 1995, and 1996.
